document_data.caption: An attacking vulture drake.
document_data.name: Vulture Drake
document_data.mainbody: A '''vulture drake''', also known as a '''deathwing''', was a type of [[drake]] that had been corrupted by the [[Shadowfell]].
document_data.Description: The drakes were large, menacing reptiles that could be used as mounts. The vulture drake was a gaunt winged creature with taut skin and a skeletal physique. It had long and unwieldy wings.
document_data.Combat: A vulture drake would prefer to focus on a single target, swooping in and allowing itself to sustain a hit, since this would enable it to use its death shriek. Once a target was eliminated, the vulture drake would take off again in order to repeat the process.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], some vulture drakes could be found in the company of [[Shadovar]].
document_data.Ecology: The vulture drake could commonly be found in the [[Shadowfell]].
